questions.question: Keep a candle ready ……………………… the lights go out.
………………………….. the rain has stopped, we can resume the journey.
questions.description: Now that is similar to as or because.

questions.question: ………………………….. a bridge has been built over the river, you can reach there by car.
questions.description: Now that is similar to as or since or because.

questions.question: …………………………. he was in Pune, he visited a number of factories there.
questions.description: While can indicate time. It is similar to when.

questions.question: Her clothes caught fire …………………………… she was cooking.
………………………….. he was having a bath, the telephone rang.
…………………………….. he receives immediate treatment, his condition may worsen.
…………………………… being poor, they are very happy.
questions.description: In spite of is a preposition. Only a preposition can be used before an ing form.

questions.question: …………………………… being famous, he failed to win the election.
…………………………. you go, you will find mosquitoes.
questions.description: Wherever means it doesn't matter where.

questions.question: He brings nice gifts …………………………….. he visits us.
………………………. he worked, he made several good friends.
